name: Gemma
0:
”Alexa, open Gemma”
”Alexa, ask Gemma to tell me the absent days”
”Alexa, ask Gemma to get time table for today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gemma
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hello, my name is GEMMA, and I'm your personal educational assistant powered by artificial intelligence. I can provide educational, administrative, and school related information such as school fees, child's location, timetable, assignment dates and many more.
 

Please start by saying- "Alexa, Open Gemma ".
 

Know your child's outstanding fee amount to be paid
Find out your child's location any time of the day
Stay informed on your child's timetable schedule
Stay updated on your child's assignment due dates
Know when the public holidays are to plan your vacations
 

Sample questions
 

Alexa, ask Gemma to tell me outstanding fee amount
Alexa, ask Gemma to get time table for today
Alexa, ask Gemma to tell me the absent days
Alexa, ask Gemma What is fees for this term
Alexa, ask Gemma what is time table for today
Alexa, ask Gemma What is the outstanding fees
Alexa, ask Gemma to tell me the absent days
Alexa, ask Gemma to tell me the absent dates
Alexa, ask Gemma are there any due assignments
Alexa, ask Gemma What assignments are due
Alexa, ask Gemma Any assignments due for today
Alexa, ask Gemma What's fee details
Alexa, ask Gemma to get time table for tomorrow
 

 

 

GEMS Education, the leading K-12 school operator has won at the prestigious 'Loyalty Magazine Awards 2019' under the Middle East and Africa category for its GEMS Rewards loyalty programme, and named the 'Regional Loyalty Champion of the Year' for Middle East and Africa.
 

Great Teachers inspire great students.
Along with our students, we never stop learning
 

 

GEMS Education: We see genius in every child
Every child has the potential to be great, and at GEMS Education we give them the opportunity to explore their true capabilities.
We want everyone to feel confident in their choice of a GEMS Education school.
Our parents feel excited for the future of their children.
Because we see genius in every child
 

To learn more about GEMS visit: https://www.gemseducation.com/
